messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the term used to describe the internal organ that exhibits the power in question?
hune
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are some potential applications that the power manifesting in the hune could have?
weapon or method of transport
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a characteristic of the Chthonians, besides their flowing tentacles?
a lump in the upper body of the thing… a container of sorts for the brain, ganglia
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is the author of the text?
Brian Lumley
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the physical characteristics of chthonians?
Their elongated wormlike bodies are coated with slime.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do chthonians communicate with each other?
All stages of chthonians communicate by telepathy.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the most important individual chthonian?
The most important individual chthonian is the gigantic Shudde M’ell.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the age range of chthonians?
They live more than a thousand years.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is unique about the way chthonians communicate?
All stages of chthonians communicate by telepathy.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is special about an adult chthonian's power over other species?
Adult chthonians can telepathically control members of other species.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do adult chthonians respond to extreme temperatures?
Adult chthonians can withstand enormous temperatures, up to 4000°C (7200°F).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why might chthonians migrate to the Earth's surface?
Perhaps they migrate here to give birth, since the younger stages cannot withstand extreme heat.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where do chthonians live?
The core of this planet
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if a full adult chthonian is immersed in water?
It destroys a chthonian
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where are chthonians found worldwide?
Basalt under the oceans
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a mystery city in western Africa that chthonians frequent?
G’harne
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where do Chthonians detect water?
They detect water by distinguishing the relatively low echo profiles of water and watery sediment.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where are some Chthonians found?
They are worldwide, including in basalt under the oceans and in western Africa, specifically in the mystery city of G’harne.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the general discussion about in the text?
The general discussion is about the full adult, the last and largest stage (instar) between molts.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What special power do Chthonians have?
Chthonians have telepathic control, which they use to control humans unless the target has something they want, such as odd spherical mineral formations.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the last and largest stage (instar) between molts for the general discussion and initial statistics?
the full adult, the last and largest stage (instar) between molts
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect on a target if a chthonian telepathically attacks them?
the target is bound to the area where psychically attacked
